vclaim: Meryl Streep was fired by director Ron Howard from a from a "Happy Days" reboot project for lying about Donald Trump mocking a disabled reporter.
title: Meryl Streep Fired from Major Project for Lying About Trump?
subtitle: A fake news article posted on several unreliable web sites claimed actress Meryl Streep was fired from a major television project for lying about Donald Trump.
author: David Emery
